reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 295/15: EXEMPTIONS RELATING TO THE 2015 PAN/PARAPAN AMERICAN GAMES ATHLETES' VILLAGE
reg_info.reg_name_text: EXEMPTIONS RELATING TO THE 2015 PAN/PARAPAN AMERICAN GAMES ATHLETES' VILLAGE
reg_info.act_under: Land Transfer Tax Act   Loi sur les droits de cession immobilière

content.content:
1. Each person set out in Column 1 of Table 1 is prescribed for the purpose of clause 22 (2) (a) of the Act as exempt from tax under the Act in respect of the conveyance from Her Majesty the Queen of the land described in Column 2 of Table 1 opposite the person set out in Column 1. Table 1 Item   Column 1   Column 2 

  1.    Canary Block 4 Inc.   Block 4, 66M-2488, City of Toronto, being the whole of PIN 21077-0300 (LT) 

  2.    Canary Block 11 Inc.   Block 11, 66M-2488, City of Toronto, being the whole of PIN 21077-0307 (LT) 

  3.   Canary Block 12 Inc.   Block 12, 66M-2488, City of Toronto, being the whole of PIN 21077-0308 (LT) 

  4.   Canary Block 13 Inc.   Block 13, 66M-2488, City of Toronto, being the whole of PIN 21077-0309 (LT) 

  5.   Canary Block 16 Inc.   Block 16, 66M-2488, City of Toronto, being the whole of PIN 21077-0312 (LT) 

  6.   Dundee Kilmer Developments GP Inc.   FIRSTLY: Part of Block 1 on Plan 66M-2488, designated as Parts 5 to 10, inclusive, and Part 13 on Plan 66R- 28137, City of Toronto, being part of P.I.N. 21077-0297 (LT) SECONDLY: Part of Block 2 on Plan 66M-2488, designated as Parts 20, 21 and 22 on Plan 66R- 28137, City of Toronto, being part of P.I.N. 21077-0298 (LT) THIRDLY: Part of Block 14 on Plan 66M-2488, designated as Parts 41 to 54, inclusive, and Part 59 on Plan 66R- 28137, City of Toronto, being part of P.I.N. 21077-0310 (LT) 

  7.   Dundee Kilmer Developments GP Inc.   Part of Block 15, 66M-2488, designated as Part 6 on Plan 66R-28200, City of Toronto, being part of P.I.N. 21077-0311 (LT)
